meanings.definition: Descended from a common evolutionary ancestor.
meanings.sent1: The monophyletic family tree showed how all the species were related.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the monophyletic relationships between different bird species.
meanings.sent3: The monophyletic family reunion was a great way to trace our shared ancestry.
meanings.sent4: The monophyletic bond between the siblings was evident in their similar traits.
meanings.sent5: The monophyletic connection between the plants was fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a group of organisms that includes all descendants of a common ancestor.
meanings.sent1: The monophyletic group consisted of various species with a shared ancestor.
meanings.sent2: The researcher identified the monophyletic clade based on genetic similarities.
meanings.sent3: The monophyletic party of animals celebrated their common heritage.
meanings.sent4: The monophyletic community thrived due to their shared genetic history.
meanings.sent5: The monophyletic lineage of plants showcased their evolutionary journey.
